annotations.description:
Provides a Redis database on CentOS. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/redis-container/tree/master/6/README.md.

WARNING: By selecting this tag, your application will automatically update to use the latest version of Redis available on OpenShift, including major version updates.

Provides a Redis 6 database on CentOS 7. For more information about using this database image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/redis-container/tree/master/6/README.md.
